review_title: Great school but a bit overwhelm
pros:
- well known 
- nice cohort background
- gret diversity
cons:
- schedule is too busy for students 
- many unnecessary elements in the course that can be eliminated

review_title: Toxic and bullying culture  where you can be underpaid and overworked
job_title: Academic in Manchester City Centre, England
pros: Some amazing colleagues. Flexible working arrangements. Great opportunities to find roles across the wider university
cons:
Horrendously arrogant, cruel and dismissive senior management. Staff are treated with no dignity or respect. Dreadful senior management communication. No strategic direction. 

The malaise flows downwards from a deeply incompetent and callous head of the business school. 

Research is based on theory only - practical contributions not valued at all

MBAs and executives are “taught” by staff with no business experience - many of whom do everything in their power to avoid interacting with the real world

job_title: MBA in Manchester City Centre, England
pros: One of the top university of world-class
cons: Manchester is not modern as London with fewer resources.
